vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H1445', 'matchingForm': 'גֶּ֫דֶר', 'stepTransliteration': 'ge.der', 'gloss': 'Geder', '_searchResultRange': 'Josh.12.13@Josh.12.13-1Chr.12.7', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '基德', '_es_Gloss': 'Geder', '_zh_Gloss': '基德'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1446H', 'matchingForm': 'גְּדוֹר', 'stepTransliteration': 'ge.dor', 'gloss': 'Gedor', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.4.39', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '基多', '_es_Gloss': 'Gedor', '_zh_Gloss': '基多'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1446I', 'matchingForm': 'גְּדוֹר', 'stepTransliteration': 'ge.dor', 'gloss': 'Gedor', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.8.31-9.37', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '基多', '_es_Gloss': 'Gedor', '_zh_Gloss': '基多'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: ge.der (גֶּ֫דֶר "Geder" H1445)
§ Gedor = "wall"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a son of Penuel
2) a son of Jered
3) a Benjamite of Gibeon
n pr loc
4) a town in the mountainous part of Judah a few miles north of Hebron
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (b)   lugar; territorio de Simeón; (c)   hijo de Jehiel; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   lugar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基突 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "牆"
陽性專有名詞
1) 毗努伊勒的子孫 (代上 4:4)
2) 雅列的子孫 (代上 4:17)
3) 基遍的一名便雅憫人 (代上 9:37)
專有地名
4) 在猶大山區的小鎮, 就在希伯崙北方幾英哩處 (代上4:39)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
基突 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "墙"
阳性专有名词
1) 毗努伊勒的子孙 (代上 4:4)
2) 雅列的子孙 (代上 4:17)
3) 基遍的一名便雅悯人 (代上 9:37)
专有地名
4) 在犹大山区的小镇, 就在希伯仑北方几英哩处 (代上4:39)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Gedor = "wall"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a son of Penuel
2) a son of Jered
3) a Benjamite of Gibeon
n pr loc
4) a town in the mountainous part of Judah a few miles north of Hebron

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.31;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Abdon (H5658J), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732)
